Address.label: Address
Address.value: 121 SOUTH WEST SALMON STREET, PORTLAND, Oregon, 97204, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Portland General Electric is a regulated electric utility providing generation, transmission, and distribution services to 917,000 customers representing about half of all Oregon residents. The company owns (wholly or through joint ventures) a total of 3.3 gigawatts of gas, coal, wind, and hydro generation.

value.name: Benjamin Felton
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
